summary: Adds a few ("sexy") armor and clothing pieces to Brynhildr follower by ickylol (via Tesgeneral).
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][size=4][color=#dd7e6b]DISCLAIMER[/color][/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][color=#dbb0a7][size=2]The follower featured on this mod page belongs to author(s) from [i]Tesgeneral[/i].
This mod is simply a patch intended to maximize the existing features of the original.[/size][/color][/font][/center]




[font=Verdana][size=4]Summary[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=2]This mod (so far) adds some skimpy armors and clothes to [url=https://www.tesgeneral.com/followers-a-c?lightbox=dataItem-j439isnx4]Brynhildr[/url] follower from [i]Tesgeneral[/i]. It's primary purpose is to convert the original mod into a more R-rated version.[/size][/font]



[font=Verdana][size=4]Features[/size][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]4 additional armors[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]3 additional pairs of arm gear[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]3 additional pairs of footwear[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]1 additional pair of pauldrons[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]1 additional clothing[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]original equipment converted into "sexier" versions[/size][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Requirements[/size][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]latest version of Skyrim[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]Dawnguard, Dragonborn, and Hearthfire DLCs[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.tesgeneral.com/followers-a-c?lightbox=dataItem-j439isnx4]Brynhildr follower[/url]﻿[/size][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Recommendations[/size][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url][/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/]HDT Physics Extensions[/url]﻿[/size][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Installation[/size][/font]

[list=1]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]Download and install [url=https://www.tesgeneral.com/followers-a-c?lightbox=dataItem-j439isnx4]Brynhildr[/url]﻿ follower from Tesgeneral.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][i][color=#93c47d](recommended)[/color][/i] Download and install the mods listed under the Recommendations section above.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]Download [b]Brynhildr follower v0.1.2 (unofficial update)[/b] found under the Main Files section.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]Using a mod manager such as NMM, install [i]Brynhildr follower v0.1.2 (unofficial update)-91928-#-#-##.7z[/i].[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]When installing using NMM, it will ask you if you'd like to upgrade to a newer version of the mod. Choose "NO".[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]When NMM asks to confirm overwrite, choose "YES" or "YES TO ALL".[/size][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Credits[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.tesgeneral.com/followers-a-c?lightbox=dataItem-j439isnx4]Brynhildr[/url] by ickylol[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]
Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url]﻿ by Caliente
CBBE+ by Arkon89
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT[/url] by ChronoTrigger77
[/size][/font]



[center]_______________________________________________________________

[size=4][font=Verdana][u]Other Mods[/u][/font][/size]

[size=3][font=Verdana][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89088]Batheile the Endowed (stand-alone follower)[/url]﻿[/font][/size]


_______________________________________________________________[/center]
author: ickylol via Tesgeneral - source of original mod

added a clothing piece and an armor set
updated body mesh
renamed some equipment
